description: This JavaScript source file defines a React component for a 'How It Works' informational webpage in a roadside assistance application. It includes UI components, hooks, and navigation logic to present a multi-step process and FAQ section related to the service.

methods.name: FlowStep({ n, icon, title, subtitle, bullets })
methods.description: A React component displaying a step in the process flow with icon, title, subtitle, and bullets.

methods.name: FaqItem({ q, a, open, onToggle, id })
methods.description: A React component representing a single FAQ item with toggleable answer.

methods.name: HowItWorksPage()
methods.description: Main React component for the 'How It Works' page, detailing the process flow and FAQ sections.

ctags.pattern: /^function FaqItem({ q, a, open, onToggle, id }) {$/
